title: Some say he's still waiting to this day

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

replies.body: Oh snap that looks shitty! You should maybe troubleshoot that in a custom or practice game to make sure your connection isn't having some kind of weird hiccup that's kicking you out of the queue. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly, then if that doesn't help shoot this screenshot over to our techs so they can try to see what's going wrong.
